TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementPath extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 提供一个包装，用于分析和生成 WMI 对象的路径。

span.span: Provides a wrapper for parsing and building paths to WMI objects.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类分析对 WMI 对象路径。The following example demonstrates how the class parses a path to a WMI object. 该示例中分析的路径是指向类的实例的路径。The path that is parsed in the example is a path to an instance of a class. summary.span: 获取或设置在没有指定范围时将使用的默认范围路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the default scope path used when no scope is specified.

summary.span: 默认范围为 \\\\.\root\cimv2，可通过设置此属性来更改范围。

span.span: The default scope is \\\\.\root\cimv2, and can be changed by setting this property.

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含不指定范围时所用的默认范围（命名空间）路径。

span.span: Returns a that contains the default scope (namespace) path used when no scope is specified.
